website_summaries.verdict: A lumbar support pillow that simultaneously reduces the risk of slouching and keeps your back in the proper alignment.
pros: Pillow is long, wide and deep to provide tremendous back support
Includes a wooden lumbar support board
Durable cover is washable and maintains its appearance for an extended period of time
Comes with elastic straps to hold the cushion in place
cons: Tends to emit a chemical odor
Pillow's back strap is very short

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a Lumbar Cushion That Offers Support
customer_reviews.text: Most lumbar support pillows sold today are made of memory foam. If you think about it, what good is memory foam when you need support to correct bad posture and to relieve pressure when sitting. This pillow offers you the support you need and includes a composite board that increases support if you need that extra amount of "stiffness." If you don't need this added support, you can remove it. The pillow is high quality and a reasonable price too. Save your time reading through all the reviews of memory made pillows that cannot offer the support you need. Try this one and start feeling better sooner than later.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Not all lumbar cushions are equal!
customer_reviews.text: Take it from someone that suffered a spinal injury 25 years ago, I have tried MANY different lumbar support cushions. Most are cheap with not much side support so the cushion ends up moving while you drive. The curvature is also a factor and most are just flat so you back doesn't arch much. These are perfect because the sides are bigger which keeps it in place and the arch is just right to make your back comfortable. I had this for 10 years until I lost it on a road trip... my back was in pain until the replacement came. Don't waste your money on the "sponsored" cushions and buy this one !
customer_reviews.author: The Kims

customer_reviews.title: It is just ok, see my list.
customer_reviews.text: 1st. Remove the board in the back! It is easy to remove and you will be more comfortable. 2nd. I wish I bought memory foam instead of this harder foam. It is ok,...maybe for some people. 3rd. I am female and size 6. This runs small. It fits me. But should be bigger. 4th. ,... to the crybabies who said my think is falling apart,...NO it is not! Take the terrible board out and re-fix the cover! It's like your pillow case falling off your pillow. Adjust it!
customer_reviews.author: K R TTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Little to no padding/support
customer_reviews.text: The actual product is extremely thin for back support. The sides pop out to appear like their is more cushion however the amount of actual padding on the back is about half an inch at most. Was expecting more fullness. I would return the product if I could, however it’s not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Lumbar Support Devices Work
customer_reviews.text: Unsure of exactly what lumbar support product would meet my needs I purchased both the Love Home Memory Foam Lumbar Support Cushion and the Duro-Med Relax-a-Bac Lumbar Back Support Cushion. Both products are excellent! As the Love lumbar support is a little softer I use it in my recliner. However, in my car I use the Duro-Med lumbar support as it is firmer. I am in pool therapy to rehabilitate my back. However, I am certain that the use of lumbar support devices is reducing my lower back pain. As such I would highly recommend both products.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamTop Contributor: Writing

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but good
customer_reviews.text: I like the firmness of the foam and the added support from the wooden insert. Unfortunately the strap doesn’t fit around my car seat (2019 Kia Rio) so the cushion must be adjusted every time you sit down. It is slightly difficult to find that “perfect” spot where it feels like it’s in the right area of your back. Overall, I like it and would recommend it to someone looking for substantial low back support.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBadGuy

customer_reviews.title: Just not right
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for almost a week and really cannot find a comfortable spot for my back. The sides poke my back side ribs. The center is too deep causing the side to wrap around and bother the ribs. I read similar reviews saying same. I agree. I used with and without the board and still not right. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kikicat

customer_reviews.title: Supportive but bulky
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product is just too bulky and uncomfortable. Not to say that the pillow itself is uncomfortable, but it makes the seat you are using too “bulky”. I got this for my car and although it does provide support- its pushes you up so much that i can not reach my head to the headrest, nor can i slide my seat back beyond the max. Good product in theory- better than most quality wise just... not great for most seats, chairs, or office chairs (i tried all 3). Again, It does feel good on the back until it gets too annoying. 2.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bju

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am only 25 but have issues with sitting for long periods of time because my lower back gets very sore. I bought this to put on my desk chair and its mostly resolved my issues. I am on the smaller side, so I think this protrudes a little further than what would ideally put the perfect curve in my spine. I occasionally take it off my chair, but for the most part I have used it every day since I purchased it. Its not perfect, but I have a lot less pain a lot less frequently than before.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Flimsy, Don't Waste Your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I had to retrieve my discarded support from garbage as this one is so flimsy and soft it did not provide any support whatsoever, despite the manufacturer adding a hard board insert...I think the manufacturer either missed the point or did not test the final product as the foam body needs to be FIRM, not the wooden insert.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.58

customer_reviews.title: Slips to bottom of seat
customer_reviews.text: I removed the hard back almost immediately. It's a lot more comfortable without it. This would be nearly perfect if it were height adjustable. The strap is loose and stretchy. It is made of a cheap Halloween costume-like black material. I've tried doing it myself by using a rubber band in the back. It still slips down to the bottom of the seat. My caboose doesn't need the support, my back does. Avoid this one and go for something else if you need lumbar support.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown and described
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I found a bit odd is there was a piece of quarter inch press board in back of item. I think it may be for added support but I found it far too firm. The board is easy to remove, the back of item isn't seamed up but folded and lapped over. I like that, it allowed me to remove the board and will make washing the cover very easy. Recommending this to others who are looking for a good , portable lumbar support cushion.
customer_reviews.author: MizM

customer_reviews.title: Nice firm pillow
customer_reviews.text: Tried one of those memory foam lumbar pillows and it was useless. Just compressed and offered absolutely no support. Well, maybe an exaggeration. Might have compressed to one inch. This pad if firm foam and does the job for support. Works best for me turning it upside down and it gets the bulges in the right place for my back. Has a strap to hold it in place on a chair.
customer_reviews.author: sweater

customer_reviews.title: The seat back support cushion to get!
customer_reviews.text: The seat back support cushion was like a needle in the haystacks of memory foam-based cushions which I found to be not supportive enough. The foam is dense enough to provide excellent support! As soon as I tried it, I ordered another one because of how hard it was to find. The only negative is the thin strap to hold the cushion in place on the chair.
customer_reviews.author: L. Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was going to be like leaning back on a rock and would have to be returned but all it took was pulling out the hard piece of cardboard and voila, comfort and just the right amount of support. I understand some people might need that extra hardness of the cardboard, and it is in no way a pliable piece of cardboard, so it's good whichever way works best for you.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA C.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend  this for anyone who is suffering
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product yesterday and am using it working from home because of the Covid19. OMG! My lower back stop hurting. I've substituted a small bed pillow and was very uncomfortable. I love my chair pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Feist

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is just what I was looking for. It fits perfectly for both the car and on me, doesn't seem to wear (although I've just been using it less than 2 months), doesn't come out of the car every time you get out, and is inexpensive. Plus it gives just the support and the pain relief a person looks for. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherilyn

customer_reviews.title: Used for over a year and is great!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this in my car every day for the past year and wish I had bought another for my work chair! It's held up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Best lumbar support product yet
customer_reviews.text: Save your money on those flimsy mesh and elastic designs and go for this. It is comfortable yet firm and supportive, and after a week of heavy (12 hour day use) it shows hardly any sign of wear. I'm 5'10" and this is a good height for me. One consideration: The elastic strap does very little other than keep it from falling forward when you get up. This will work well with chairs that have a back that meets or comes within ~ 4in of meeting the seat. The strap will not do wonders in securing it higher up on the chair back, nor will it adapt well to a design like this: (
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Herbst

customer_reviews.title: ... trip and we wanted to make sure we had good lumbar support throughout our trip
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get two of these since my husband and I were going on a road trip and we wanted to make sure we had good lumbar support throughout our trip ;) The Duro-Med Relax-a-Bac provided great support and was firm..a little firmer than I would've wanted, but hopefully it gets just a bit squishier with time. We don't really use the straps, so it's not a problem like it states in other reviews. These support cushions are also great for when you're at your computer, or anywhere else for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this back support!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this back support pillow!! I'm a court reporter, and I bought this to use on both my home office chair and to take with me to court/depos b/c the chairs there are never conducive to hours writing on a steno machine. This pillow gives me just the right support (nice and firm, not too hard or too squishy) and just the right amount of extra inches to keep me close enough to my computer keyboard and/or my steno machine so I can have a nice, ergonomic position. I'll be getting a second one to keep in my car!!
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings on the cushion but it does support back
customer_reviews.text: I found this cushion very large and bulky. I had to really stretch the strap to fit it on my work chair. It pushed me very far forward in my seat which I felt was awkward. It also had a bump down the middle of it that I could feel when leaning back against it. That aside it did help support my back while sitting in the chair so I have mixed feelings on it. I'm not sure if I'm going to keep it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped my lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: This really helped to relieve my lower back pain from sitting too long! Of course, you still need to take breaks from sitting for long periods of time, exercise, etc. to really get over the back strain that comes with a desk job but this certainly added significantly to my issue. Overall, great quality as well for the price and it came out to me super quick! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amaaaaazin'
customer_reviews.text: In the words of Jesse Lee Peterson, this is "Amazin' ". It works great for my new Lazy Boy recliner that has no lumbar support. This is perfect. I wanted this one because it doesn't have memory foam. Memory foam gradually flattens as you sit and becomes useless. This stays firm and gives great support. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dunkyj24

customer_reviews.title: but either way it was pretty helpful while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I'm at a solid 3.5-4 stars for this. It has helped me support my back fairly well, but after 5 months of continued use, the cover stretched out and the foam inside started deteriorating. I'm not sure if that is normal wear and tear or not, but either way it was pretty helpful while it lasted. You probably would need to repurchase this product every year at the minimum though, especially if you live in a climate with extreme temperatures which effects the durability.
customer_reviews.author: NicR

customer_reviews.title: Decent support pillow for back
customer_reviews.text: It was hard at first and then it get very soft as time goes by. It is still comfortable though. Overall it is pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Kwee

customer_reviews.title: I luv my lumbar sturdy pillow...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly the firmness I need and desire. The memory foam units are not firm enough for my comfort. This pillow did exactly what I wanted in a car kidney pillow...
customer_reviews.author: Danny McVay

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: This cushion didn't fit into my subaru seat, it is too wide and just sits on top of the curvy back of the seat. When I tried to return it, I got the message "This item isn't eligible for return".
customer_reviews.author: Maria Furman

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very bad back and have tried five or six different kinds of supports, a mesh support, a couple inflatable supports, a blockier foam support. This one is the best by far. I wctually supports my back, unlike the mesh one, and it doesn't put too much pressure on the back, unlike the others. It's shape is such that your entire back can be pretty evenly supported. I like it. I may try iut a few different foam ones like this one, just to see if I can narrow it down to perfection, but this one is a very good start.
customer_reviews.author: Ashly

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my car. I spend a lot of time in my car and I've had awful lower back pain. I started using this and its 100% gone! I put it under my seat cover, and for the most part it stays! Every once in a while I readjust it but If It was a big deal I'm sure I could find a more permanent way to keep it in place. It's sturdy enough but conforms with your back. Im sure a car seat isn't ideal for this item but it works and I'm happy. I imagine it would work even better in a computer desk or normal chair!
customer_reviews.author: ItsAMe_Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Why didn’t I buy this sooner? Perfect for working from home in kitchen chairs. Relieved my discomfort and pain such that I am no longer considering purchasing a separate office chair for home.
customer_reviews.author: Gella

customer_reviews.title: I wish I knew if it is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have experienced how comfortable or uncomfortable it is but unfortunately, it was taken once it was delivered. I have a feeling someone took it along with their delivery. The bad part is they didn’t return it. Perhaps they found it to be quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Terry G

customer_reviews.title: A miracle!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews because if what I ordered arrives on time and in good condition I see no need to go into a lot of detail. However in this case after 5 minutes of use of the lumbar support by nagging back discomfort was reduced by approximately 95%. Moreover when I go about my daily routine there is hardly any discomfort. I cannot relate to anyone with serious back problems e.g. requiring surgery or professional therapy. But for anyone like this old coot who has to deal with stiffness and mild discomfort I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 and can't say enough how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: I have had very expensive, ergonomic chairs and none really have gotten the right shape/form as this lumbar support. Bought 2 and can't say enough how comfortable they are. The strap is not all that durable appearing and cannot fit all chairs, however I prefer just positioning the back support when I want and not worrying about the strap. Overall seems pretty durable and purchased one for home and office. Might not alleviate everyone's back pain and I still deal with mine, however anything can help and this does help. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: All in all, good value
customer_reviews.text: The product works well for the price. I use it in my car and the strap while elastic wasn't able to fit around the back of my seat. This one seems to stay in its place pretty well so it wasn't a huge deal (I had another that would fall forward every time I got out). The one I had previously was a little more comfortable with better memory foam, but was more costly. All in all, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for less than half a year and the strap already broke. Even while it had the strap, however, my chair is slightly wider than it so it would constantly slide from side to side. It did provide a little bit of support but it moved around too much to be any help. I just want to stop having pain every time I sit for more than twenty minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic back pain and this helps at the office having to sit down for 8 hours a day. It fits well into my office chair and I like that it can be strapped to the back of the chair so it doesn't move around.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Duro-Med Relax-a-Bac - I use it in my car
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lumbar support cushion to use in my car. I have a lumbar disc issue from a vehicle accident in the past. This cushion gives me the necessary support while I drive especially if I have to drive for extended periods of time. I like the extra support it provides especially since I drive a later model full sized car. I did not use the added insert since that made the cushion too firm. The other advantage to the cushion is that it makes you sit up with better posture and avoids slumping which places pressure on the lower lumbar discs. I thoroughly enjoy my Duro-Med cushion.
customer_reviews.author: movin-on66

customer_reviews.title: and now I feel like that is something I can finally consider doing again
customer_reviews.text: I have had low back discomfort (sometimes severe) for years sitting in cars, airplanes, even couches and chairs. I finally got this before a two day, 16 hour road trip, and I experienced ZERO pain in my back. I have even used it on airplanes and shorter car rides...it's been a life saver for me. I was afraid to go on a long road trip because I thought it would take me weeks to recover, and now I feel like that is something I can finally consider doing again. Wish I had bought it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good back support but the strap that attaches it to a chair is useless.
customer_reviews.text: The back support wedge itself is good and has made my office chair more comfortable to sit in, the problem is with the strap that holds it around the chair back. The strap is very weak and does not hold the wedge cushion in one place/elevation. no matter how I adjust it, it always sinks down to rest on the piece of metal on my chair that attaches the backrest to the seat, which is way too low to use this back cushion properly. I will probably have to modify this product with a better attachment method to use it better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: A lot of lumbar pillows loose their shape and support ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of lumbar pillows loose their shape and support after a short time, but I've been using this daily for almost 2 years and it's supportive as ever. It's really helped the back and hip pain I had while driving long distances.
customer_reviews.author: Ruggedor

customer_reviews.title: Best Back Support
customer_reviews.text: I love this lumbar support, got this one to replace a old one I had for years and the fabric started to rip. I like this one because it has the added firm support board and not just memory foam
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. He needed one to help support his spine while sitting in his favorite chair reading and relaxing. I tried it out myself and it's very comfortable. I wasn't so sure about the board in the back but it has turned out to be quite helpful. The cover comes off easily for washing. Overall, this is a very good product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: allaboutcats

customer_reviews.title: Very Good One Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my office chair. It does what it’s supposed to do. The only flaw is that it doesn’t stay put. I’m constantly moving around and every time I sit down it needs to be readjusted. The elastic band is very loose and there is no way to adjust the band to fit a smaller chair unless you have the spare time to get creative, and unfortunately I do not. I would probably recommend this for a larger widthed chair. I’ll be using this particular on in my car.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Back pillow
customer_reviews.text: I like this pillow but the elastic strap that holds it in place in my chair is not long enough. I have to reposition the pillow often because it just sits behind me in my office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Capable

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for all kinds of chairs
customer_reviews.text: This back support didn't work out for me. I tried it on my office chair and my chair at home and it didn't work well with either of them. It kept sliding around since there's only 1 medium thickness strap that keeps it on the chair. The foam in the support is great if it actually fits, so I imagine it just depends on your chair. I find that those cheap mesh lumbar supports work the best for my needs. If your chair is larger or too small, I wouldn't recommend this. I also think the elastic strap won't last too long with frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Duong

customer_reviews.title: Offers great support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 85 year young father for his birthday. We have 3 of these at our home for our use. When my father came to visit this summer he loved this cushion and said "I need one of these. Where did you get it?" This lumbar cushion fits perfectly in the small of your back and offers a great deal of support and comfort. It is very well made and has held its shape beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed something within my price range to support my back at work. I found this cushion to be comfortable and very sturdy. It only took a day or two to get used to it. I was also worried that the strap would be too short, but it's designed to fit even the largest of office chairs. My back definitely feels better. My only complain would be the quality. While my cushion is just fine now, I can already tell that I'll need to purchase a new one within the next year or so. Don't expect it to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Regret that I opened it
customer_reviews.text: I would send it back if I could. Worse with this thing than without.
customer_reviews.author: Max Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great lumbar support at work!
customer_reviews.text: Wow.......this has helped my back soooo much. I had an issue with low back pain and decided to try this at work since I sit at the computer a lot. It has helped so much......my back isn't even hurting now and it feel so comforting and supporting. The price is really good. I did have to create a tie from the top of the back to keep it up on my chair. It kept sliding down. Tied it on and it is wonderful! I need to buy another for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced and filled a need.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for relief from what I hope is a temporary back condition. I use it my office chair and have used as a lower back support in my pick-up truck. This isn't a fancy back support, but it is firm (which I like) and was reasonably priced. I'm very happy with it. It has a piece of removable fiberboard in the back of it, which contributes to firmness. Even without the board, this cushion would still be firm and retain its shape. It wouldn't be convenient to take on a plane since you can't really fold or compress it. And, it's easy to forget since it's not strapped to your back. Minor, minor. It helps my back.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin J Jensen

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up from most desk job workers when ordered for a team
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several of these for members of our (software) Engineering department where I work. One complained that it always slips, but said he wasn't sure if it was just the chair though or if it's the cushion. Others reported being very pleased with the product, and said they would individually rate it 4.5 stars. So, I averaged out to 4 stars for this review. One commented that they liked it but the wood was useless for them, and others had removed the wood backing also. But I guess it's the same price or cheaper to include the wood backing, so no harm to include it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One for the office and one for my car. I really didn't care for them at first, but then remembered another review that mentioned them having a removal board. Once I removed the board, it was much better. Both my office chair and car have a lumbar shape to them, so the flat board was getting in the way. the elastic band is sufficient for the car seat, so it moves around a bit getting in and out of the car. Thinking about getting a car seat cover to help lock that one in more.
customer_reviews.author: KillinIT

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Lumbar Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Nice lumbar pillow, a little more money than I expected to pay but I really like it so far. The real evaluation will be how long it last or holds up under normal use. I am happy with it at this point and it meet my expectations so far. I would recommend this for others that find this type of pillow valuable to you. I drive a lot and do not have the money to but an expensive car will superior design seats so I buy a lumbar pillow to assist.
customer_reviews.author: indyj

customer_reviews.title: No more back pain!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this cushion I no longer suffer from back pain from sitting too long . I ended up buying 3 of these over time, one for the office and one for each car. It is also good to bring to concerts, sports games, long movies or anywhere with uncomfortable seats that hurt your back. It offers great lumbar support and is cushiony and comfortable. I find that I only use the strap for my computer chair, I had to tie it to make it tighter so it doesn't slip. In the car it is unnecessary to use the strap because your weight and the shape of your back keeps the cushion in place.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Removable "board" allowed us to each choose the level of support that we needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for me, and one for my husband. We are using them in our office chairs and we both love them. This back support cushion has a hard board that you can either keep in or remove based on how much support you need. I removed mine and I find the cushion to still offer plenty of support. My husband kept the board in his and he reports that he likes it that way. I am using mine along with the Simple Future Memory Foam Comfort Seat Cushion and I find this pairing to be great.
customer_reviews.author: E Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Helps back
customer_reviews.text: This helps my back. I am 5'2, and I use it in the car. My back doesn't hurt when I get out of my car. It does put your butt several inches forward in the seat, but I had room to move the chair back. The cover slips off, which is the reason for four stars. It looks sloppy. I pull it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good for use with all backed chairs and sofas
customer_reviews.text: The shape and size of this pillow is perfect for home use. The board inside the back part of the cover serves no real purpose, as far as I can tell. The foam inside is sufficient to provide plenty of support. I do like the elastic band on the back to hold it to a chair if I want to do that, although that band could be a bit more sturdy. It's a little lightweight for the pillow, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Murray Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Office chair only
customer_reviews.text: This works great with an office chair, but not with any other chair
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable + good support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband after surgery. He likes it! It is comfortable & gives him good support which keeps him from hurting. Definitely recommend this cushion.
customer_reviews.author: EnduringBrightness

customer_reviews.title: It damaged my expensive chair
customer_reviews.text: The wooden board on the back ripped a hole in my chair and the elastic band broke in a week
customer_reviews.author: Yavee

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to my patients as I have been very ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a Physical Therapist and I get low back discomfort after sitting for long periods of time at my desk. This is a high quality lumbar support. I recommend this to my patients as I have been very happy with the quality and support that this product offers.
customer_reviews.author: A. Malm

customer_reviews.title: Got multiple spinal problems? This is what you need.
customer_reviews.text: This is not as portable or "nifty" as the thermarest lumbar support or clones of same, but it's more beneficial for my back, which needs support throughout the lumbar area up into the lower thoracic. The thermarest and other inflatables provide support to a smaller area. Very firm but cushiony enough to be comfortable. EXCELLENT for driving. If not for this product, I could not have driven 900 miles last weekend.
customer_reviews.author: JonBoy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the car.
customer_reviews.text: I am short, so I use this to push me forward in my car driver's seat. I looked and looked for a car with a seat that fits my body but couldn't find it. My husband bought me this. It pushes me forward so that pressure is not on the back of my knee which causes me pain.
customer_reviews.author: John Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a few days, and I can definitely tell a difference. I don't slouch as much at my desk, and my back isn't as sore when I go home for the day. The only suggestion I would make would be to make it available in a slightly smaller size. I'm 5 ft 1 and could use a slightly smaller size. All in all, great item.
customer_reviews.author: Glitchaholic

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Just wonder how long this item could keep ...
customer_reviews.text: After losing the first pillow in an aircraft seat, I did not hesitate to buy a second one since the first pillow was of surprising good quality and at such a good price. However, I am not satisfied with the second one at all. The qualify of the second one is so-so, and is way lower than the first pillow I bought here. It is true that the item has been changed, as mentioned in other reviews. It should not inherit the high rating from their former product. It is misleading and cheating
customer_reviews.author: Yin

customer_reviews.title: Better than the McKenzie Standard Roll
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few of these lumbar supports and this is my favorite. the McKenzie roll doesn't stay put I constantly have to adjust it everytime I sit or move and the strap is crap. lol. This is much more comfortable and the position is much more natural. the only thing I thing could use improvement is the strap. its kind of flimsy. I have neck problems from sitting all day. cervicogenic headaches and I am trying to be more conscious of my posture which led me to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda

customer_reviews.title: Great support for my bad back
customer_reviews.text: Very good back support . At first I almost thought it was to much . As it turns out its great support . I have a bad back and this offers great relief . This was actually a second order . I ordered two . One for my wife and one for me . My inlaws came over and they ended up asking me to get them each one and my wife a second one for work . I would also say that to stick with this company . My second order was with another company . Same exact discription but not the same pillow .
customer_reviews.author: Daddyo

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lower Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: I have occasional sciatica flare ups & SI joint issues. This cushion is great. Without this cushion, I can't sit for more than 20 minutes before getting pain, so it works for me!
customer_reviews.author: bdx

customer_reviews.title: Got another one
customer_reviews.text: I liked this back pillow so much, I ordered another one.... one for my couch potato sitting during COVID 19 Quarantine, and one for my office chair. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and supportive!
customer_reviews.text: It's soft enough to be comfortable, but definitely firm enough to offer support. I *like* the "wings" on the sides. I intentionally searched for one that had them. It feels like my back is being gently cupped while I'm driving. I bought the black one that was less than $14, and I'm very impressed with the quality. My only complaint is the strap isn't long enough to go around the seat in my car, so it doesn't stay in place. However, in my experience, these sort of things rarely stay in place even with the strap. For the price, I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ~My Lovely Me~

customer_reviews.title: this was an easy fix to remove the odor
customer_reviews.text: Many reviews stated that there was an odor from this product. While I agree with the other people who have stated this, this was an easy fix to remove the odor. I removed the outer covering and washed it in my washing machine on a gentle cycle and let it hang dry. I Febreezed the inner white foam part lightly (front and back) and let it dry over night. Once everything was dry I put the cover on it again. I have been using this back support for the last 3 months and there is no odor and my back has improved greatly--100%. I would recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: TRS

customer_reviews.title: Works on my husband's bad back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's kitchen chair to replace a throw pillow he was using for back support. He is pleased with it and likes that it has strap to attach it to the back of his chair. It is easily moved to any chair in the house. He sometimes uses it on his office chair as well. I'm happy to get my throw pillow back where it belongs on the couch and he's happy to have his own back support pillow for his chair. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Ael

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work and my back hurts driving for so long. This is the most comfortable back support pillow. I will be ordering another one for my desk chair!
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: I use it in my truck
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT BACK SUPPORT in my big pickup.. I have a hard time seeing over the steering wheel and this is PERFECT to help that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Holsted

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Giftable product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my supervisor in my internship. He loved ut and still mentions it whenever we communicate. It has help me make good connections so it has a soft spot in my heart.
customer_reviews.author: Niraj Shrestha

customer_reviews.title: YIPPPEEEE
customer_reviews.text: This support has been a blessing for my husband. He has been dealing with lower back issues. I bought this for his office chair. He was very skeptical and wanted me to send it back. But fortunately, I convinced him to just try it. Within weeks, his back was feeling better. Now he won't sit in his chair without it and thanks me that I surfed and found it. Thought about buying one for the car but it pushes him too far forward. It really does work.
customer_reviews.author: backncy

customer_reviews.title: Nice support for your lower back.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these back in 2012 and I bought another one for my wife in July 2015. It serves its purpose as we sit 8+ hours a day staring at the computer screen. I would say being aware of your posture is far more important; however, with a cushion giving you a little support for your lumbar wouldn't hurt. I would recommend for individuals who sit for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lora C.

customer_reviews.title: Made pain significantly worse
customer_reviews.text: Good in concept, but a simple 2 hour drive that normally makes my back a little sore, made my back AWFUL with this "support". I was in so much pain!! I bought this for a 15 hour each way drive I had to make at 8 months pregnant. After that 2 hour test run I returned this awful pillow and used a towel instead. The towel was not adequate, but it was FAR better than this support. At least the towel didn't cause more pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kendyl Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good for lower back
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfortable it feels for my lower back and it definitely helps when I am sitting at the computer for long periods of time
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I spend many hours sitting as part of the work we do...and often the chairs available do not provide proper support. The Duro-Med cushion creates the proper support for us regardless of the chair we are using. The hard, board insert is especially helpful. We first purchased one for me to see how it worked, and my wife immediately "borrowed" it for her chair. So we purchased a second one, and use them every time we need them. Our backs now no longer ache after a long day.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. May not be best product for car.
customer_reviews.text: The is a nice product and I noticed the difference it made on my lower lumbar the week I started using them. I will continue to use them, and will probably buy the same or similar products for the other chairs around my house. Only didn't give this a 5 because I use this one in my car and the elastic band isn't quite big enough to fit around the seat. Had to over stretch it and thus doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Leo N

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for the price - I use it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow for the price - I use it in my car daily and it gives great support for my lower back (and I drive 5 days a week, 3 hours plus - the difference is night and day between how I felt before it and now). One comment is that the strap to wrap it around the seat is somewhat tight for thicker car chairs. Mine is barely holding in there without ripping.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Supportive & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This simple cushion is easy to install (just hook the elastic over the back of your chair) and provides immediate relief. Everyone in my family spends long hours hunched over a computer. The oldsters were getting lower back pain, and the young ones seemed to be developing a hunch. I'm now buying a third one of these as a Christmas present. After up to a year of daily use, they still look pretty good, and the elastic is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with a 2013 CR-V EX
customer_reviews.text: The seat cushion does not fit on a 2013 Honda CR-V EX. It is too wide. There is no information in the description indicating non-compatible vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatic man

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Investment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to relieve the constant lack of back support for my office chair. It was easy to slide over the back of the chair, and has held its shape well having been leaned on every day for upwards of 8+ hours. Missed the 5-star mark due to the elastic band showing some signs of "overstretching". Would be nice to have a more adjustable form to modify fit on different, bulkier chairs.
customer_reviews.author: medwards1

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a bit too thick?
customer_reviews.text: Rather hard cushion, but hopefully over time it will soften up a bit. Tried it both ways and think works for me best is with the thicker edge at the bottom of my office chair. Does push oneself off the chair a couple of inches, hope to get used to it. With my sciatic pain, anything will be an improvement. Worth the money and does not smell (black) at all.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia-Jim

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and works great for lower back support
customer_reviews.text: I have had lower back pain for 2 years and recently had surgery. This is a great product. I first ordered it because it was inexpensive and seemed to be just what I needed. I was right. I have ordered a second one; both of them in black (for some reason, the other colors are slightly more expensive). I have a similar product (same shape) but this one is better because of the wood insert. At first it seems cheap and not important --but I am loving it. It really makes a difference in the level of comfort and it's easy enough to move to almost any type of chair. Glad I took a chance. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Woody

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my car to drive Uber in. The straps don’t fit around the seat, but it’s still manageable as long as you can place it behind your back. I can see how this can be comfortable for some, but for me it was as if it provided too much support and the cushioning was way too rigid, so it ended up hurting my back even more. Maybe not for everyone, certainly not for me
customer_reviews.author: Ayo

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Pretty stiff and narrow. There is a back strap but it only long enough for a kitchen chair. Wont come close to strapping around a recliner. Need to have D Rings to add a custom strap.
customer_reviews.author: mollysdad

customer_reviews.title: Best back cushion on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty severe lower back issues and have been trying different back cushions in my truck for years. This is the only one I’ve found that works for me. I think the hardboard panel makes the difference. This is my second one after wearing out the first one. Too bad I didn’t find this one first, because it’s cheaper than most others I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: and helps me maintain good sitting posture
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and spend most of my day sitting in a wooden kitchen chair. My back was killing me. This cushion gives firm support, and helps me maintain good sitting posture. It is not very soft, but it does mold just enough to be very comfortable and supportive. I highly recommend it if you sit in a hard chair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ullman

customer_reviews.title: Won't fit standard desk chairs.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit in standard desk chairs. It'll force you to sit so far forward that you're more or less balancing on the edge of your chair.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, durable lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: I have had severe lower back issues for the last six months and first bought this pillow for use in the car. I liked it so much that I bought another one for my office. I have also traveled extensively with this pillow and have used it in airplanes, conference rooms etc. For the price, it is a very comfortable and durable pillow. The only downside is that it is a bit too large and it is hard to find a large enough bag to carry it around in. It would be great if it came with a travel case.
customer_reviews.author: bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job well, but obviously it's not perfectly form fitting. It helps a bit with support, but it feels like it needs to be more custom tailored to people's bodies.
customer_reviews.author: sdanzzz

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with the waste of shipping materials
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, same time, same order. Their size is 13"x14"x5". My single order was shipped in 2 separate boxes, each 24"x24"x16". Does not make sense. Looks like an opportunity for someone. Cushion was good. Still trying it out. Cushion gets a 4star. Packaging gets 1star.
customer_reviews.author: MB Snipes

customer_reviews.title: Nice support
customer_reviews.text: I got a task chair at a secondhand office furniture retailer and found the back needed help to give my lower back better support. This product serves that purpose well. The cushion is firm. Folks who like a little more give will not like this product. My only complaint is the color. It was advertised as "gray" but there's a slight brownish tint to it that clashes with the charcoal color of my chair. That doesn't affect its usefulness, however. Added plus: This product is made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: CDW

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have this on the back of my office chair. It seems to work pretty well yet I haven't tried any other cushions so there's nothing I can compare it to. It has helped my back comfort. I just wish it was a couple of inches thicker. The only outright bad thing I can say about it is that the band that wraps around the back of the chair slips down. All through the day, I tend to have to pull it back up. i think this would depend on the type of chair you have though. For the price, it's worth it. It's durable and firm.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingSupergirl

customer_reviews.title: good for an old desk chair
customer_reviews.text: it is good for my old desk chair that didnt have any kind of lumbar support. it really makes a difference. but in my truck where i already seat with my seat in the most further position from the front, it pushes me to much. so... good for an old chair, not good for a truck seat if you already maxim out the position on it. it maybe good in a car to help a short person reach the pedals
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Changed the way I sit forever
customer_reviews.text: As someone with chronic back pain, this product was a life-changer. I used to never feel comfortable in chairs for more than 30 minutes, but this let me spend hours at the computer without pain. After buying one of these, I went on to buy more for every office chair in the house. The price is great and this larger format is way better than simple narrow pillows. Finally, these pillows can be easily positioned for lumbar or thoracic support.
customer_reviews.author: TheVoltaire

product_meta.title: DMI Lumbar Support Pillow for Office or Kitchen Chair, Car Seat or Wheelchair comes with Removable Washable Cover and Firm Insert to Ease Lower Back Pain and Discomfort while Improving Posture, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black"DURO-MED RELAX-A-BAC LUMBAR CUSHION LOWER BACK SUPPORT PILLOW WITH ALIGNMENT STRAP Easily turn your favorite chair into a lumbar support chair that helps melt away and prevent back pain. GREAT FOR: Poor Posture Daily Fatigue Injuries Chronic Back Pain Arthritis Traveling and more Recommended by Chiropractors, Physical Therapists, and Healthcare Professionals to Ease and Prevent Lower Back Pain Fits perfectly in office chairs and at home on your sofa, recliner, or in your bed as a bedrest while reading or watching TV. Also, take it with you on the go; fits great in airplane seats and vehicle seats to prevent and reduce stiffness on trips as well as lower back pain. DURO-MED RELAX-A-BAC LUMBAR CUSHION FEATURES: Orthopedic design relieves tension and keeps spine in proper alignment Lumbar cushion made of molded, highly-resilient foam Convenient elastic strap holds the cushion in place and makes carrying a breeze Wooden insert adds increased support Includes removable and washable cover Ideal for home, office or travel Available in four attractive colors: gray, black, burgundy, navy DURO-MED RELAX-A-BAC LUMBAR CUSHION DIMENSIONS: 14 inches tall by 13 inches wide with a depth of 5 inches.
feature_bullets: EASE LOWER BACK PAIN from posture, arthritis, injuries, and more with the best selling lumbar pillow
LOWER BACK SUPPORT has never been easier for your home, car, or office
ORTHOPEDIC FOAM LOWER BACK SUPPORT PILLOW keeps its shape and has been specifically designed to reduce slouching while keeping the lower back properly aligned

LOWER BACK SUPPORT CUSHION INCLUDES WASHABLE COVER AND WOODEN LUMBAR SUPPORT BOARD to insert as needed for extra support along with an alignment strap to ensure your lumbar cushion stays in place on your chair
PRODUCT DETAILS: 14 inches tall X 13 inches wide with a depth of 5 inches, Polyester cover
